message: Looks like we may have one more boil.  I'm going to guess that we are going to have 150+ gallons on the trees by this evening. It should good as the ants seem to be enjoying it. Anne and I and maybe Eldon will collect this evening. I'm charging the tractor battery. John is coming home Wednesday evening so he want's us to store it and boil it Thursday.
I wasn't too far off.  Anne, David and Eldon collected 140 gallons.
The lake is still ice covered, but getting dark. We will boil maple sap tomorrow. (Broadcasting live at http://ustre.am/9agz)

We will boil for the last time today beginning at 4PM.  We should have about 170 gallons of sap.  The head sapmeister has returned from vacation so it should go faster...40+gallons/hr.  We'll be done for the season by 9:30PM
